ygData.subject: Re: Why
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi .. so you only have problems once you ve purchased the team and click go ? Odd .. as someone else suggested, if you installed the game into a directory
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 35
Message-ID: <17248.35.102.959279670@...>
Date: Sat, 29 May 1999 15:39:55 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Why


>From: amyvan133@...
>
>Why can't I get the game to work? I downloaded a version from the net and 
>the game will start up with no sound but whne you hit to play now the 
>screen goes black...after you buy your team and all.....somone please 
>help.....frustrated..thanks

Hi .. so you only have problems once you've purchased the team and click 
"go"? Odd .. as someone else suggested, if you installed the game into a 
directory where you had it before, you might try unzipping it into a clean, 
fresh directory just to make sure none of the files were corrupted. Other 
than that .. not sure what to say; haven't heard of that problem before :(

--Tom
